TopicTitle: Cool ideas for possible science experiments

Articles.Content:
With the new FOR SCIENCE! update coming I thought I would make a  thread for people to propose new science experiments for the game, explain how they would function, etc...

For instance:

Spoiler

With LIGO becoming functional in recent history  discovering black hole and neutron star mergers I think setting up a similar system in space would be a pretty cool idea. The experiment would require 3 satellites be held in an orbit or in interstellar space with a 90 degree angle maintained on the central laser emitting/receiving satellite. When completed this experiment would obviously reward players with a massive science point haul or something similar and perhaps could reveal a new system very distant where a merger occurred and when visited could be prospected for extremely rare resources

I think having to set up a system like this would really test the meddle of players in the late stages of the game, it would be involving in a fun and testing way, and offer a point of advancement in exploration mode

So everyone else please propose your ideas and if we get enough maybe I can make a poll to see which experiments people find most intriguing
